TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpServerChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, ISecurableChannel
type TcpServerChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 TCP 协议传输消息的服务器信道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道跨越远程处理边界 （例如，计算机或应用程序域） 传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 类传输使用 TCP 协议的消息。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端进行到的远程对象调用时，则会将调用序列化到一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器通道传输和接收的客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要执行其他处理的消息在服务器端中，你可以指定的实现接口处理的所有消息都可通过传递实例。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 实例接受二进制或 SOAP 格式中序列化的消息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. A对象有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件在运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过将传递集合到构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在服务器计算机正在运行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定为安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用可远程处理类型。The following code example shows the use of a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例演示了利用类公开可远程处理类型。The following code example shows the use of the class to expose a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在服务器计算机正在运行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定为安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`sinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建具有特定的配置属性的对象。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/server.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/server.cs#21)]

summary.span: 使用给定名称初始化 类的新实例，该实例侦听指定的端口。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given name and that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性使用`name`参数。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果你想要注册多个通道，每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要请求，动态分配可用的端口，设置`port`参数设为 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示如何构造。The following code example shows how to construct a . MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制在哪个通道将出现在的数据的顺序实例; 出现在较低的优先级通道之前的更高优先级通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 客户端尝试连接到中列出的顺序中的服务器信道实例。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 在调用 方法停止侦听通道后，指示当前通道开始侦听通道。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数自动调用`StartListening`，因此不应调用此方法，除非之前已调用。The constructor automatically calls `StartListening`, so you shouldn't call this method unless was previously called. 调用`StartListening`已侦听通道上可能会导致意外行为，应当避免。Calling `StartListening` on an already listening channel may lead to unexpected behaviors and should be avoided. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 数据对象可以用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果不希望将特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 该信道的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以停止侦听通道上。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新开始侦听，使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 数据对象可以用于将特定的初始化状态传递到通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果不希望将特定状态传递到通道，设置`data`到`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
